info.name: Threat Intelligence Platform APIs
info.description:
This is a Postman Collection for the Threat Intelligence Platform endpoints.

Refer to the [Threat Intelligence Platform website](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/threat-intelligence-api-docs/general-information) for more details.

If you have an API-related question, you can ask them here: [https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/#contact-us](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/#contact-us)

## Installation

### Manual install

You can download this Collection from a GitHub repo here: [https://github.com/whois-api-llc/postman-whoisxmlapi](https://github.com/whois-api-llc/postman-whoisxmlapi)

## Environment

This Collection includes a pre-configured Environment. You will need to set up the following variables in order to run each request:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `api_key` | Your API key |

item.name: Connected Domains API
Get a list of domains resolving to an IP

query.description: The target domain name.

response.name: Get a list of domains resolving to an IP

query.description: The target domain name.

item.description:
Connected Domains API allows you to retrieve a list of domain names resolving to a given IP address, including subdomains.

Full API documentation is available [here](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/threat-intelligence-api-docs/reverse-ip-lookup-api).

item.name: Domain Malware Check API
Check if a domain is considered dangerous

query.description: The target domain name.

response.name: Check if a domain is considered dangerous

query.description: The target domain name.

item.description:
Domain Malware Check API, for a given domain name, checks if it is considered dangerous in different security data sources.

Full API documentation is available [here](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/threat-intelligence-api-docs/domain-malware-check-api).

item.name: Domain Reputation API v1

query.description: The target domain name or IPv4 address.

TIP can check the domain specified in two modes: "fast" (default): only select test codes will run — i.e., 62 WHOIS Domain status, 82 Malware Databases check, 87 SSL certificate validity, and 93 WHOIS Domain check—while other tests and data collectors will be disabled. "full": All tests will be performed, similar to what the TIP GUI displays.

response.name: Get a reputation score in fast mode

query.description: The target domain name or IPv4 address.

TIP can check the domain specified in two modes: "fast" (default): only select test codes will run — i.e., 62 WHOIS Domain status, 82 Malware Databases check, 87 SSL certificate validity, and 93 WHOIS Domain check—while other tests and data collectors will be disabled. "full": All tests will be performed, similar to what the TIP GUI displays.

response.name: Get a reputation score in full mode

query.description: The target domain name or IPv4 address.

TIP can check the domain specified in two modes: "fast" (default): only select test codes will run — i.e., 62 WHOIS Domain status, 82 Malware Databases check, 87 SSL certificate validity, and 93 WHOIS Domain check—while other tests and data collectors will be disabled. "full": All tests will be performed, similar to what the TIP GUI displays.

item.description:
This endpoint allows you to evaluate a domain's reputation based on numerous security data sources and the instant host's audit procedure.

Full API documentation is available [here](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/threat-intelligence-api-docs/domain-reputation-api).

item.name: Domain Reputation API v2

query.description: The target domain name or IPv4 address.

TIP can check the domain specified in two modes: "fast" (default): only select test codes will run — i.e., 62 WHOIS Domain status, 82 Malware Databases check, 87 SSL certificate validity, and 93 WHOIS Domain check—while other tests and data collectors will be disabled. "full": All tests will be performed, similar to what the TIP GUI displays.

response.name: Get a reputation score in fast mode

query.description: The target domain name or IPv4 address.

TIP can check the domain specified in two modes: "fast" (default): only select test codes will run — i.e., 62 WHOIS Domain status, 82 Malware Databases check, 87 SSL certificate validity, and 93 WHOIS Domain check—while other tests and data collectors will be disabled. "full": All tests will be performed, similar to what the TIP GUI displays.

response.name: Get a reputation score in full mode

query.description: The target domain name or IPv4 address.

TIP can check the domain specified in two modes: "fast" (default): only select test codes will run — i.e., 62 WHOIS Domain status, 82 Malware Databases check, 87 SSL certificate validity, and 93 WHOIS Domain check—while other tests and data collectors will be disabled. "full": All tests will be performed, similar to what the TIP GUI displays.

item.description:
This endpoint allows you to evaluate a domain's reputation based on numerous security data sources and the instant host's audit procedure.

Full API documentation is available [here](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/threat-intelligence-api-docs/domain-reputation-api-v2).

item.name: Domain's Infrastructure Analysis API

query.description: The target domain name.

response.name: Get domain infrastructure entries

query.description: The target domain name.

item.description:
This endpoint allows you, for a given domain name, to get a collection of its web, mail, and name servers - for each infrastructure entry to find its IP address, geolocation, and subnetwork information.

Full API documentation is available [here](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/threat-intelligence-api-docs/domains-infrastructure-analysis-api).

item.name: SSL Certificate Chain API
Get a domain SSL certificate chain

query.description: The target domain name.

response.name: Get a domain SSL certificate chain

query.description: The target domain name.

item.description:
SSL Certificate Chain API lets you get detailed information about its SSL Certificate and the complete SSL Certificate chain.

Full API documentation is available [here](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/threat-intelligence-api-docs/ssl-certificate-chain-api).

item.name: SSL Configuration Analysis API

query.description: The target domain name.

response.name: Check SSL configuration

query.description: The target domain name.

item.description:
For a given domain name, SSL Configuration Analysis API establishes and tests SSL connection to the host and analyzes how it is configured.

Full API documentation is available [here](https://threatintelligenceplatform.com/threat-intelligence-api-docs/ssl-configuration-analysis-api).
